entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. A few flurries beginning near noon. Local amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
